title: Apartment for Rent - 2 bedroom/1 bath - Arlington, MA
posting_body: ['2 bed/1 bath Apartment available for rent in Arlington, MA ($2200/month + Utilities)', '*Available 9/1/22', '*Beautiful floors throughout unit', '*Stainless steel appliances including gas stove and microwave', '*Living Room with In-Unit A/C', '*Located on top floor corner of low-rise condo', '*Furnishings available', '*Steps from Minuteman Bike Trail, 77 MBTA Bus route through Mass Ave', '*MBTA accessible to Harvard Square, Porter Square Stations.', 'Easy drive to Alewife Station.', '*Walkable to Trader Joe’s, Stop and Shop, Whole Foods Market', '*1 deeded parking spot available', '*Additional storage and new laundry machines available in building', '*Ample spaced closets', '*Heat/hot water/gas included', '*Tenant responsible for Electricity and Internet', '*Ideal neighborhood, excellent environment', '*No smoking, no drugs, no pets', 'Please respond if interested.', 'Thanks!']
